text: The 1999 Biathlon Junior World Championships was held in Pokljuka, Slovenia from February 17 to February 21, 1999. There was to be a total of 8 competitions: sprint, pursuit, individual, and relay races for men and women. == Women's results == === 7.5 km sprint === * Date / Start Time: Wed February 17, 1999 /
